Legal_Issue: Whether the Defendants infringed upon or passed off the Plaintiffs' trademarks
Procedural_Stage: Motion for injunctive relief and summary judgment
Evidence_Assessment: No identical or similar trademarks, trade names, logos, or menus; no confusion or likelihood of confusion demonstrated
Decision_Outcome: Plaintiffs' motion dismissed; Defendants' summary judgment granted
Burden_of_Proof: On Plaintiffs to demonstrate infringement or passing off
Credibility_Factor: Plaintiffs' case viewed as an attempt to stifle competition
Legal_Rule: Trademark infringement governed by sections 19, 20, 22; passing off under section 7(b) of the Trade-marks Act
Standard_of_Review: Summary judgment standard â€“ genuine issue for trial
Procedural_Issue: Defendants moved for summary judgment to dismiss claims
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged mimicry of restaurant concept and trademark use
Outcome_on_Merits: No infringement or passing off found
Judicial_Review_Outcome: Claims dismissed with costs awarded to Defendants
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Defendants entitled to dismissal due to lack of genuine issue
Key_Evidence_Considered: Absence of similarity in trademarks, names, logos, menus; no evidence of consumer confusion
Legal_Framework: Statutory framework under the Trade-marks Act and common law passing off
Defendant_Response: Motion for summary judgment arguing no infringement or passing off
Evidence_Type: Documentary and comparative evidence of branding and business elements
Outcome: Claims dismissed; costs awarded to Defendants
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Failure to establish similarity or confusion
Applicable_Process: Civil litigation procedure, summary judgment process
Outcome_of_Review: Summary judgment granted in favor of Defendants
